text: King Arthur and the Knights of the Roundtable decimation of the Bruah-Atlantis and Mu’a-Lemuria Maji Grail King Amerind lines of North America, in the European quest for the ''New World.'' • It was long known among the competing Knights Templar, Jehovian and Nephedem (Omicron-Drakonian) Annu-Melchizedek Illuminati Human inner circles that the “New World” of America was the Old World of which Bruah-Atlantis, the location of the central control site ''Gru-AL Point'' for Earth’s Planetary Shields, was once part.
